BREAKING US Embassy Beijing 'explosion': Huge blast rocks Chinese capital with 'smoke everywhere'

We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story

Eyewitnesses are reporting a large explosion at the US Embassy in Beijing.

Photos and video clips posted online show smoke, a cordon around a vehicle and a road partially blocked by police as eyewitnesses gather outside a gated compound.

Men in military uniforms were standing guard at the cordon.

replies.msg: 封鎖消息
習先生玩大左

在北京的美國駐華大使館，今日下午1時50分許突然傳出附近疑似發生爆炸。從網上傳出的影片及相片可見，該處冒出一陣灰白色濃煙，大批警員及武警在場戒備，並拉起警戒線。其中一條短片，有疑似警員在一輛汽車前蹲下檢查，旁邊有些膠墊，以及一塊疑似覆蓋人體的藍布，現場亦可見有救護車出現。網傳有人受傷。

據說有一名男子企圖對大使館投擲爆炸物，但沒成功，炸傷自己。


http://s.nextmedia.com/realtime/a.php?i=20180726&s=10793096&a=58488458
